participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

socialdev_pneigh_11_l.Description: There is a lot of graffiti in my neighborhood. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_25_l.Description: I can trust MOST people in my neighborhood. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_24_l.Description: My neighborhood is safe. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_23_l.Description: The police protection in my neighborhood is adequate. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_22_l.Description: In my neighborhood=people watch out for each other. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_21_l.Description: There is a lot of crime in my neighborhood. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_20_l.Description: I'm always having trouble with my neighbors. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_19_l.Description: There is too much alcohol use in my neighborhood. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_18_l.Description: There is too much drug use in my neighborhood. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_17_l.Description: There are too many people hanging around on the streets near my home. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_16_l.Description: People in my neighborhood take good care of their houses and apartments. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_15_l.Description: My neighborhood is clean. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_14_l.Description: There are a lot of abandoned buildings in my neighborhood. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_13_l.Description: Vandalism is common in my neighborhood. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_12_l.Description: My neighborhood is noisy. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Agree ; 4=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_10_l.Description: People in this neighborhood can be trusted. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_09_l.Description: People in this neighborhood do not share the same values. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_08_l.Description: People in this neighborhood generally don't get along with each other. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_07_l.Description: This is a close-knit neighborhood. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_06_l.Description: People around here are willing to help their neighbors. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_05_l.Description: My neighbors could be counted on to intervene in various ways if the fire station closest to their home was threatened with budget cuts. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_04_l.Description: My neighbors could be counted on to intervene in various ways if a fight broke out in front of their house. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_03_l.Description: My neighbors could be counted on to intervene in various ways if children were showing disrespect to an adult. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_02_l.Description: My neighbors could be counted on to intervene in various ways if children were spray-painting graffiti on a local building. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree

socialdev_pneigh_01_l.Description: My neighbors could be counted on to intervene in various ways if children were skipping school and hanging out on a street corner. | 1=Strongly disagree ; 2=Disagree ; 3=Neutral ; 4=Agree ; 5=Strongly agree
